doc.ContractDescription: IGF::OT::IGF SUPPLEMENTAL AGREEMENT

CRITICAL FUNCTION - THIS SERVICE CONTRACT IS FOR ECONOMICS AND RISK ANALYSIS STAFF (ERAS) ANALYTICAL SUPPORT (EAS) SERVICES THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS AS FOLLOWS: 1)DUE TO AN ACCOUNTING ERROR HAVING DUPLICATE LINES OF ACCOUNTING FOR PR-OLEM-16-00149 USED TO INCREMENTALLY FUND MODIFICATION NUMBER 71 FOR CONTRACT EP-W-12-013 OPTION PERIOD FOUR (4), THIS MODIFICATION 73 IS ISSUED TO CORRECT THAT OBLIGATION ERROR ON MODIFICATION NUMBER 71. THE OBLIGATION RECORDED VIA MODIFICATION 71 WAS NOT PROCESS. MODIFICATION 73 WILL SERVE AS THE OFFICIAL RECORD TO CORRECT THIS ISSUE. 2)THIS MODIFICATION ALSO EXERCISE FOUR (4) OPTION QUANTITY IN OPTION PERIOD FOUR (4) ONE (1) OPTION QUANTITY EQUALS: (HOURS=1,000 DOLLARS $104,450.37 (COST= $97,759.46 PLUS FIX FEE=$6,690.91). FOUR (4) OPTION QUANTITY EXERCISED EQUALS: (HOURS=4,000 DOLLARS $417,801.48) (COST=$391,037.84 PLUS FIX FEE=$26,763.64) THE NEW COST PLUS FIXED FEE CEILING FOR OPTION PERIOD FOUR (4) IS $957,832.33 (COST=$896,452.05 PLUS FIX FEE=$61,380.28). 3)FUNDING IS ALSO BEING OBLIGATED TO CONTRACT EP-W-12-013 OPTION PERIOD FOUR (4) IN THE AMOUNT OF $851,827.83 TOTAL FUNDS OBLIGATED CEILING FOR OPTION PERIOD FOUR (4) IS $871,827.83 AND THE NEW COST PLUS FIXED FEE CEILING FOR OPTION PERIOD FOUR (4) IS $957,832.33 (COST=$896,452.05 PLUS FIX FEE=$61,380.28). THE CONTRACTOR IS NOT AUTHORIZED TO EXCEED THE TOTAL COST PLUS FIX FEE AND FUNDING CEILING OF THIS CONTRACT WITHOUT PRIOR APPROVAL BY THE CONTRACTING OFFICER. IGF::CT::IGF
